LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandAdditionalCleans: Number of additional cleaning cycles executed per installed vacuum arm/hand
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandAdditionalSpeed: Default work done is 1.0 and 'additional work done' is added to this for each vacuum arm/hand (The total is further modified by the pawn's cleaning speed stat, if using mods which allow modifying this stat)
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipFootAdjacentCleans: Number of cleaning cycles executed on adjacent filth per installed mop leg/foot A single cycle may not be enough to fully clean a tile, but already speed up cleaning greatly
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipFootAdditionalSpeed: Default work done is 1.0 and 'additional work done' is added to this for each mop leg/foot (The total is further modified by the pawn's cleaning speed stat, if using mods which allow modifying this stat)
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipWarCrimesMode: Adds an adjustable mood debuff per installed cleaning limb if enabled
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHorribleLimbsMoodEffect: The strength of the mood debuff per part if cleaning limbs are set to be horrible
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandPartEfficiency: Adjusts the part efficiency of the vacuum arm/hand (may require reloading)
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandMovementSpeed: Adjusts the movement speed malus for an installed vacuum arm/hand (may require reloading)
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipFootPartEfficiency: Adjusts the part efficiency of the mop leg/foot (may require reloading)
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipFootMovementSpeed: Adjusts the movmenet speed malus for an installed mop leg/foot (may require reloading)
